description: Working with materials from other dimensions is never easy.  But this definitely improves your ability to work on fabrics and furs from the lands under the hill.
//: I don't know if I'll make any advanced proficiencies for changeling recipes but I'd like to at least have some base level ones.

name: Dreamsmithing
description: Proficiencies for using your magic abilities to cast items with thaumaturgical abilities.
You know how you use your mind to transform dreamdross into basic shapes.
Your knowledge has grown, and you know how to shape dreamdross into a weapon of terrible power.
Your knowledge has grown, and you know how to shape dreamdross into an indestructible armor.
Your mind and feeling are the one.  Your items are impossible.  Your dreamdross could be everything.
